sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-title>{{ post.title.rendered }}</v-card-title>
    <v-card-text> {{ post.content.rendered }} </v-card-text>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-text-field v-show="editMode"></v-text-field>
      <v-textarea filled v-show="editMode"></v-textarea>
    </v-card-text>
    <v-card-actions>
      <v-btn @click="deletePost(post.id)">Delete</v-btn>
      <v-btn @click="editPost">Edit</v-btn>
      <v-btn
        :edit="editMode"
        v-show="editMode"
        @click="updatePost(post, post.id)"
        >Save</v-btn
      >
    </v-card-actions>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import PostService from "@/services/PostService";

export default {
  props: {
    post: Object,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      editMode: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async deletePost(id) {
      let res = await PostService.deletePost(id);
      console.log(res);
    },
    editPost() {
      this.editMode = !this.editMode;
    },
    async updatePost(post, id) {
      var tmp = { title: post.title.rendered };
      console.log(post);
      console.log(id);
      console.log(tmp);
      let res = await PostService.updatePost(tmp, id);
      console.log(res);
    },
  },
  created() {
    console.log("creating post", this.post);
  },
};
</script>
